column4: hi, starting last night, my ubuntu hardy freaks out at random when i navigate text word-by-word using ctrl+left or ctrl+right, in any app (gnome-terminal, gedit, firefox etc). it keeps thinking my ctrl key is being held down when it's not, whatever i click it responds as if i were ctrl+clicking. i have to do ctrl+alt+backspace to get it back to sanity. windows has never acted like this whenever i use ctrl
you can use "xev" to check your keyboard.
xev is just show keyname when you press any key. just a test soft
so can check if the keyname is right one.
